title: Mauritius Top Indoor Activities
content: Indoor ideas: L'Aventure du Sucre museum, Blue Penny Museum, Caudan Waterfront shopping, spa and wellness in Grand Baie, rum tasting at Chamarel, tea route at Bois Chéri.

title: Mauritius Outdoor Highlights
content: Beaches: Flic-en-Flac, Trou-aux-Biches, Île aux Cerfs. Hikes: Le Morne, Black River Gorges. Water: snorkeling at Blue Bay Marine Park, catamaran cruises.

title: Mid-range Hotels with ballpark MUR prices
content: Hotel XYZ (MUR 8000/night), Grand Baie Suites (MUR 6500/night), Le Morne Comfort (MUR 9000/night).
